turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, good day, Assistant. Please, I want to order a cup of coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't need the medium size.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes, that would be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will go for Russ whipped cream and little sugar then I'm okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a tall espresso with whipped cream and a little bit of sugar, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to pick it up from the Starbucks at 1585 Broadway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it! your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 1585 broadway.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you very much.
